Articles.Content:
Hi!

My name is John, i'm 27 years old and i live in germany.

I'm playing KSP for about 650 hours over 15 months now.

So i thought i finally should look for some crazy people like me. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And i think the KSP-forum is the right spot, 'cause the people here are awesome.

Greetings!

Welcome to the community Alnaza, yeah we have a lot of great people here, and crazy people of course ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Have fun on the forums and fly safe!

Thanks a lot sal\_vager!

Reading your Totm, great thing!
Hello and welcome to the forums!
Thanks a lot to all of you!

Alnaza, welcome on board!

Take off safe and have good flights!

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Haha, a little late from me but welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hope you enjoy another 650+ hours!

Cheers,

~Claw
